name: Custom Holiday Postage Stamps
description:
I ordered a couple of sheets for anyone interested in buying just a few stamps for special mailings. 

They are super cute!

name: Custom Chinchilla Infinity Scarf
description:
This is a custom designed print made exclusively for ChinChic!

Made from stretch performance knit, these scarves come in three colors  and measure 11" wide by 68" long (2-3 neck wraps, 2 being average)

They come in three colors, red, light blue and gray.

PLEASE NOTE: The gray scarf has a larger chinchilla caricature than the red and blue (approximately 2 times larger per image).

Photos will be available this weekend, 11/16.

***

FREE SHIPPING within the USA. Will combine shipping for Canada and Others when purchased with additional items. Refund will be given at time of shipping if applicable.

name: Custom Chinchilla Cowl Neck Scarf
description:
This is a custom designed print made exclusively for ChinChic!

Made from stretch performance knit, these scarves come in three colors  and measure 11" wide by 13" long (one neck wrap).

They come in three colors, red, light blue and gray (not shown). 

PLEASE NOTE: The gray scarf has a larger chinchilla caricature than the red and blue (approximately 2 times larger per image).

Photos will be available this weekend, 11/16.

***

FREE SHIPPING within the USA. Will combine shipping for Canada and Others when purchased with additional items. Refund will be given at time of shipping if applicable.

name: Chinchilla Stretch Headbands
description:
These headbands are made with custom ChinChic fabric featuring darling romping chinchillas.

They measure 3" at the widest, 1" along the back. 

They are made from performance knit stretch fabric and have an short elastic band along the back for a great fit!

PLEASE NOTE: The gray fabric shown will NOT be the fabric offered. Please see the red and blue fabric for what size the gray chinchilla character will be. The red and blue are available now, the gray has been ordered but will not be available until the end of November.  

FREE SHIPPING within the USA. Will combine shipping for Canada and Others when purchased with additional items. Refund will be given at time of shipping if applicable.

*****

Pictures will be available later this weekend, 11/15 so you can see what they actually look like on a head. :)

name: Handbag Fingerless Mittens
description:
These are cozy, stretch-knit gloves complete with Handbag the Chinchilla embroidered patch on each mitten. Cute button holds open the top cover when not in use.

Limited colors available.

FREE shipping within the USA. Will combine shipping for Canada and Others when purchased with additional items. Refund will be given at time of shipping if applicable.

name: Chinchilla Ceramic Coffee Mug
description:
These adorable chinchillas will make you smile while you sit back and enjoy a nice hot beverage.

There a four different chinnies that were designed EXCLUSIVELY for ChinChic. You will not find these cuties anywhere else.

Shipping weight 13 oz.

name: Tube and Cuddle Shelf Liners
description:
This is for the fleece tube/cuddle shelf liners only.

Send me an idea of what you want for colors/patterns and we can figure out something special.

If you are looking for the tube and/or the half-tube with hardware, please see my other listings.

name: Holiday Gift Tags
description:
Who doesn't love a chinnie on their gift tag?

You will receive 19 gift tags with string to decorate your holiday gifts.

name: Holiday Greeting Card Set. ChinChic EXCLUSIVE
description:
Each of these four cards were commissioned exclusively for ChinChic. You will not find these designs anywhere else.

Each "set" includes two designs of each card including envelopes. Each card measures 5 x7 " and uses a standard $.46 stamp. There are two vertical and two horizontal designs printed on gloss paper. They are blank inside.

You will receive a a total of eight cards, with envelopes.

They will be mailed to you the week of 11/18.

And again, shipping will be combined with any other holiday items for the lowest rate.

name: 2014 ChinChic Customer Calendar
description:
This is a 2014 wall calendar, January through December featuring adorable ChinChic customers. You can see the full pages at (cut/paste the link if you need to):

http://s190.photobucket.com/user/anniefishy/slideshow/2014%20ChinChic%20Customer%20Calendar


Shipping of multiple items will be combined but will NOT be reflected on your check out. Refunds will be adjusted at the time of shipping. So if you add other items before the time of shipping, I will combine and refund any differences.

name: Handbag Hat
description:
Just in time for the holiday! Adults and youth sizes.

THE HANDBAG HAT!

Made of super soft, anti-pill fleece complete with embroidered whiskers and mouth, and safety eyes and nose.

The fleece has been pre-washed and can be machine-washed on the gentle, cold cycle although hand-washing is optimal.

All fleece color combinations use the same colored brown eyes, white embroidered whiskers/black mouth. All tassels come in the tri-colored grey yarn, except for the tan hat which uses a tri-colored brown yarn.

To determine your size, use a soft measuring tape across your forehead and around your head. PM me your size(s).

Adult Sizes:
S=21"
M=22"
L=23"

Kids Sizes:
S =19"
M =20"

********
Since these are made-to-order, please allow 5-7 business days for completion. Longer if you order more than three hats at a time.

name: Baggy Bucks
description:
Not sure what your favorite chinchilla owner wants or needs? Get them some Baggy Bucks and let them do the shopping.

Can be redeemed toward any item, including custom orders.

Perfect for birthdays and holidays.

You can choose to have a gift certificate (pdf) emailed that you can print, or simply provide a email address for notification to the recipient. Just send an email with your choice after purchase.

name: Floofie™
description:
This is a super-sized Chinnie-Buddie just for humans! Made with plush faux fur with brown safety eyes, black nose and horse-hair whiskers.

Comes in a three colors, standard gray, white and black (pic coming soon!)

If you wish to customize, just email me. I can order Iridescent colored eyes for an additional charge of $2. (see pic for choices. Takes approximately 3-5 days to arrive)

options.name: Gray w/gray belly/light gray inner ears

name: Handbag Embroidered Earrings
description:
Everyone that loves chinchillas, especially my chinchilla Handbag, will love these whimsical earrings!

These lightweight, embroidered applique, drop earrings dangle from a fish hook (also called French wires or shepherd's hooks) and have a reinforced backing so they won't curl. 

The applique measures 1.7"

The perfect holiday stocking stuffer.

FREE shipping within the USA.

name: Poopsaguard™
description:
These are awesome!

Poopsaguards™ are a wonderfully, inexpensive way to keep hay, poop, sticks and other cage items from flying onto your floor. These are great for any type of chinchilla, bird, etc., cage that has vertical bars.

Made from anti-pill fleece with ties, a "set" is two Poopsaguards™ and each measures approximately 84" in length. A set would be perfect for the top and bottom layer of say a Ferret Nation 142 cage. Custom sizes are also available, just email.

You can also order "door guards" to go on the front side of your cages that have swinging open doors. A "set" of door guards is equivalent to four pieces (based on a Ferret Nation cage). Custom size are also available, just email.

Poopsaguards™ are 6" in height, alternative heights available, just email.

Colors available (please send email me with your choice) are:
Black
Red
Dark Blue
Spring Green
Brown
Light Blue
Pink
Purple
Orange
Turquoise
Charcoal Gray
Dark Green

name: Hanging Cuddle-Cottage™
description:
This is delightful 4-tab hanging Cuddle-Cottage™ for chinchillas and other pocket pets.

***Every Cuddle-Cottage™ is made to order so please allow 3-5 business days to ship.***

It is made with anti-pill fleece inside and out, with 4-tabs for hanging and one opening (two opening option available). Comes with hanging hardware.

In addition to the house and hardware, it comes with a removable square pillow to match. Can accommodate 1-3 chinchillas comfortably.

---

Lot's of great fabric choices to choose from so contact me and let me know what you like and I'll show you some options.

---

Shipping weight approx 1 lb.

---

Machine sewn with handsewn closure.

For best results, low-heat machine wash and  air dry.

name: Foster's 4-Corner Fun Hammock™
description:
This is a 4-corner hammock made with anti-pill fleece. Perfect for chinchillas and other pocket pets. 

Each Foster's 4-Corner Fun Hammock™ is lovingly made with 2 layers of anti-pill fleece. This four-corner hammock measures 15" on all sides.

***Every Foster's 4-Corner Fun Hammock™ is made to order so please allow 3-5 business days to ship.***

Happy napping little friends.

---

Please allow 3-5 business days to ship.

---

Shipping weight is approx. 6 oz..

Comes with hanging hardware.

---

Lot's of great fabric choices to choose from so contact me and let me know what you like and I'll show you some options.

---

Thank you to our handsome model, Mister Tibbs.

name: The Tibby Tri-Hammock™
description:
Perfect for all your small pet swingers!  Great in a corner or in other limited space.

Each Tibby Tri-Hammock™ is lovingly made with 2 layers of anti-pill fleece. This three-corner, triangular hammock measures 18" on the longest side, and 15" on both shorter sides. 

Comes with hanging hardware.

***Every Tibby Tri-Hammock™ is made to order so please allow 3-5 business days to ship.***

---

Lot's of great fabric choices to choose from so contact me and let me know what you like and I'll show you some options.

---


Thank you to our beautiful model Miss Cassiopeia.

name: DanishDonut™ Bed
description:
The DanishDonut™ is perfect for a small pet hangout, sleeping area or just lounging around. Can be used from all sides. 

The round insert is completely removable for them to play with if they just want to be different and have a little fun :) 

Every DanishDonut™ is made with loving care and stuffed with anti-pill/Blizzard fleece bits. 

***Every DanishDonut™  is made to order so please allow 3-5 business days to ship.***

---

Machine sewn with handsewn closure.

For best results, low-heat machine wash and  air dry.

---

Lot's of great fabric choices to choose from so contact me and let me know what you like and I'll show you some options.

---

Shipping weight approx 1 lb.

---

Thank you to our beautiful models, Handbag, Cinder and Twyla.

name: Fleece Liner Sets for Cages
description:
Fleece liner sets are custom made for Ferret Nation or Critter Nation cages (others available on request).

This listing is for one flat liner and one cut-out liner; or two flat liners. (Custom orders welcomed.)

All liners have two-layers although an extra layer is available for a small additional cost. See options.

You have a number of choices for your liners:

1. Sit-on-Top: These liners sit on top of existing pans (plastic or Bass metal pans

2. Envelope Style: These liners are specific to those of you using the standard plastic pans that come with your Ferret Nation Cage. The pan slides in between the two layers and there is an envelope-style closure that wraps around the back of the pan. (Keep in mind though, since these are only two layers, one layer will be on the bottom of your pan so you may want to pay the additional cost for three layers so you still have two layers above the pan.)

3. Tie-Liners: These are the same as sit-on-top liners except for they have fleece ties in each corner and one in the middle of the long edge to tie onto the bars. These are ideal for chinnies who like to pull up their liners.

---

All liners set are customized so please email me with preferred colors/patterns and I will offer you some choices.

---

Machine sewn with handsewn closure.

For best results, low-heat machine wash and  air dry.

---

Shipping weight approx 2 lbs per set.

name: CuddleTube™  PVC Tube
description:
Each CuddleTube™ is lovingly made with a custom liner that fits neatly over a 10x6" PVC tube (included). Chinchillas love to snuggle in them as will other pocket pets.

The tubes come complete with the tube, one liner and all the hardware necessary to hang from any cage with at least 1/2" vertical bars. Hardware includes: 2 bolts, 4 washers and 2 wing nuts.

***Every CuddleTube™ is made to order so please allow 3-5 business days to ship.***

---

Machine sewn.

For best results, low-heat machine wash and  air dry.

---

Lot's of great fabric choices to choose from so contact me and let me know what you like and I'll show you some options.

---

Shipping weight approx 2 lbs.

---

Thank you to our models Artemus and Buttonwillow, Handbag and Molly.

name: CuddleLedge™ Half PVC Tube
description:
A perfect little place for your chinchilla or other pocket pet to take a load off and watch the world go by in a deluxe vantage point.

The CuddleLedge™ is a 10"x6" PVC tube, cut in half. It comes with the ledge, one customizable cover and hanging hardware (2 bolts, 4 washers, 2 wing nuts). Everything you need to hang immediately. Extra liners are only $4.50 each!

***Every CuddleLedge™ is made to order so please allow 3-5 business days to ship.***

---

Machine sewn with handsewn closure.

For best results, low-heat machine wash and  air dry.

---

Lot's of great fabric choices to choose from so contact me and let me know what you like and I'll show you some options.

---

Shipping weight approx 1.6 lbs.

---

Thanks to our models Sally, and Shifu and Quinn.

name: Mini-Chinnie™ for Chinchillas, Pocket Pets and others
description:
This is a duplicate of our very popular Chinnie-Buddie™ just in a pint-sized version.

***Every Mini-Chinnie™ is made to order so feel free to mix/match colors for the body, belly, inner ear and outer ear.***

A lot of people ask, what is a Mini-Chinnie™ and what are they used for? Well depending on who you ask, a Mini-Chinnie™ is just that. A little buddy that ls there to provide snuggles to a friend or...a buddy to provide...more carnal pleasures...

Many single and multiple pocket pets are always looking for a friend for a good snuggle.

The Mini-Chinnie™ is made with anti-pill fleece (also good for other pocket pets), and measures approximately 6.75" in length and stands on it's own.

Each Mini-Chinnie™ is lovingly made to order so please allow 3-4 mailing days for me to complete.

---

Machine sewn with handsewn closure.

For best results, low-heat machine wash and  air dry.

---

Shipping weight approx 8 oz.

description:
***Every Chinnie-Buddie™ is made to order so feel free to mix/match colors for the body, belly, inner ear and outer ear.***

A lot of people ask, what is a Chinnie-Buddie™ and what are they used for? Well depending on who you ask, a Chinnie-Buddie™ is just that. A little buddy that ls there to provide snuggles to a friend or...a buddy to provide...more carnal pleasures...

Many single and multiple pocket pets are always looking for a friend for a good snuggle.

The Chinnie-Buddie™ is made with anti-pill fleece fleece (also good for other pocket pets), and measures approximately 9" in length and stands on it's own.

Each Chinnie-Buddie™ is lovingly made to order so please allow 3-4 mailing days for me to complete.
